resp = client.ingest.put_pipeline(
    id="attachment",
    description="Extract attachment information from arrays",
    processors=[
        {
            "foreach": {
                "field": "attachments",
                "processor": {
                    "attachment": {
                        "target_field": "_ingest._value.attachment",
                        "field": "_ingest._value.data",
                        "remove_binary": True
                    }
                }
            }
        }
    ],
)
print(resp)

resp1 = client.index(
    index="my-index-000001",
    id="my_id",
    pipeline="attachment",
    document={
        "attachments": [
            {
                "filename": "ipsum.txt",
                "data": "dGhpcyBpcwpqdXN0IHNvbWUgdGV4dAo="
            },
            {
                "filename": "test.txt",
                "data": "VGhpcyBpcyBhIHRlc3QK"
            }
        ]
    },
)
print(resp1)

resp2 = client.get(
    index="my-index-000001",
    id="my_id",
)
print(resp2)
